getPSSysImage.rawContent: <?xml version="1.0" standalone="no"?><!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.1//EN" "http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/1.1/DTD/svg11.dtd"><svg t="1727164067633" class="icon" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2419" width="14" height="14" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><path d="M511 256.00000001m0-70.00000001a70 70 0 1 0 0 140 70 70 0 1 0 0-140Z" p-id="2420" fill="#2c2c2c"></path><path d="M511 513.5m0-70a70 70 0 1 0-1e-8 140 70 70 0 1 0 1e-8-140Z" p-id="2421" fill="#2c2c2c"></path><path d="M511 771m-1e-8-70a70 70 0 1 0 1e-8 140 70 70 0 1 0-1e-8-140Z" p-id="2422" fill="#2c2c2c"></path></svg>

getPSViewLayoutPanel.logicName: dis_comment_mob_md_view实体移动端多数据视图布局面板

editorParams.SCRIPTCODE: data.content?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replaceAll(/\#\{(\".+?\":\".+?\"),\"icon\":\"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)\"\}/g, (x, value, icon) => {const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); const tempIcon = icon.trim(); return `${tempIcon} ${item.identifier} ${item.name}`;}).replaceAll(/\{\"\emoji\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})
